participant_1.background:
I worked at a call center before I got my job at the factory.
I wake up, eat breakfast, and practice my cooking before work.
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
i have beard that is longer.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

participant_2.background:
I am an ovo-vegetarian who is trying to lose weight.
I'm always on the go and my glasses are always dirty, so I take them off and clean them every time I get a chance.
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.
i just took a trip to london.
Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

content.text: Hey, how are you?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking!
That's great to hear! What have you been up to lately?
I just took a trip to London and I am trying to lose weight.
London sounds like an amazing place to visit! How was your trip?
It was absolutely amazing! I got to see so many beautiful places and I ate some delicious food.
That sounds like a great time! I am glad you enjoyed it.
Thanks!
So, what kind of food do you like to cook?
I love to cook Italian food, but I also like to try new things.
Italian food is delicious! I love pasta and pizza.
Me too! I love cooking pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is my favorite! I love how it is so cheesy and gooey.
I know right? It is the perfect comfort food.
It really is! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great ways to relax and de-stress.
They are! I love to read books because they allow me to escape my reality for a little while.
That's what I love about reading too! It's like taking a vacation without ever leaving my house.
Exactly!
So, what are you reading right now?
I am reading a book called "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I read it a few years ago and I really enjoyed it.
I'm really enjoying it so far! I'm about halfway through and I can't wait to see how it ends.
I hope you enjoy the rest of the book!
Thanks
